Subject: Forgotten password - how do I reset?
Description:
Hi Support,

I think I've been locked out of our Endpoint Protector server, which we 
have hosted on an AWS appliance. Is there a way to reset it via the AWS 
instance?

Thanks

Warren.
What_We_Know__c: Customer forgot/changed the user password and they are not able to log in the EPP UI.
Next_Steps__c: A remote session will be scheduled in order to reset the password.
Solution_Comment__c: The password was reset from backend.
